entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:46 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 9:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
